section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Drone Manufacturers Alliance Europe (DMAE) is formed by leading global drone manufacturers DJI, GoPro and Parrot. The DMAE is a coalition to help voice drone manufacturers’ positions in Europe. To realise the economic potential of drones in Europe, DMAE is working towards an harmonised set of rules that facilitates the safe and secure uptake of drone operations. The secretariat of DMAE is run by GPLUS Europe.
relevant_communication:
-Participation in expert groups 
-Participation in and speaker at public conferences 
-Communication activities: media briefing and press releases when relevant
